content: *a little gift that will hopefully brighten up your day s * **…let me shout out a big thank you for your love your ongoing support your understanding your patience… for being by my side** … hope you enjoy for pattern support please find the questions thread here 1 ***fluffy and snug*** is a beautiful and heavenly soft set of wrist warmers and a hat that you would not want to miss when temperatures drop a great accessory for a walk as well as for your daily journey to work and the wrist warmers are also great to wear indoors i love putting them on when i m cold while sitting at the computer being a lovely relaxing knit they are perfect for those precious little skeins that you have kept for something really special beginning with a provisional cast-on **the wrist warmers fluffy ** are worked in the round as a tube then grafted together for extra soft extra warm extra cute and totally reversible doubled wrist warmers **the hat snug ** is worked from the top down in the round totally adjustable in width and length to your needs and liking the brim is loosely bound off and sewn to the ws of the hat a cute little colorblock near the end of the doubled brim mimics the look of the wrist warmers **yarn** zealana air lace weight 40% cashmere 40% brushtail possum down 20% mulberry silk 191 yds 175 m /25 g *wrist warmers* approximately 250 m mc 146 m in color natural a04 cc 104 m in color bright gold a12 *hat* approximately 215 m mc 175 m in color natural a04 cc 40 m in color bright gold a12 **needles** *wrist warmers* us 2 1/2 3 mm dpns or circular needle 32 /80 cm or longer for magic loop *hat* us 2 1/2 3 mm circular needle 16 / 40 cm and dpns or circular needle 32 /80 cm or longer for magic loop **gauge** 28 sts x 42 rounds = 4 10 cm square in stockinette stitch on us 2 1/2 3 mm needles after blocking **size adjustable ** *wrist warmers* circumference width +/- 7 5 19 5 cm length +/- 8 20 5 cm *hat* circumference unstretched +/- 18 5 47 cm length +/- 9 23 cm **notions** smooth waste yarn and crochet hook for provisional cast-on 4 stitch markers row counter optional tapestry needle blocking tools 1 https //www ravelry
